body:
Appreciated if read.


As you may know, Elian_Garcia has been global banned from Avicus for supposedly "Fly Hacking". I don't believe he was fly hacking as I was in a Skype call with him, and he has screen shared me. He told me he has forge, and he got banned for "hacking". But as many of you would know... Forge does work with any Hacked clients. I would be pleased if you would unban Elian_Garcia for it was not an appropriate ban.

title: Elian_Garcia's ban appeal.

E-mail support@avicus.net to appeal.
